cards.name: Average Work in Progress in Board / Release

native.query:
SELECT avg("source"."count") AS "avg"
FROM (SELECT "source"."assignee" AS "assignee", count(distinct "uid") as count FROM (SELECT "tms_Task"."uid" AS "uid", "tms_User"."name" AS "assignee"
FROM "tms_Task"
LEFT JOIN "tms_TaskBoardRelationship" ON "tms_Task"."id" = "tms_TaskBoardRelationship"."task"
LEFT JOIN "tms_TaskBoard" ON "tms_TaskBoard"."id" = "tms_TaskBoardRelationship"."board" 
LEFT JOIN "tms_TaskAssignment" ON "tms_Task"."id" = "tms_TaskAssignment"."task"
LEFT JOIN "tms_TaskReleaseRelationship" ON "tms_Task"."id" = "tms_TaskReleaseRelationship"."task"
LEFT JOIN "tms_Release" ON "tms_Release"."id" = "tms_TaskReleaseRelationship"."release"
INNER JOIN (SELECT "tms_TaskAssignment"."task", max("tms_TaskAssignment"."assignedAt") AS "lastAssignedAt" FROM "tms_TaskAssignment"
GROUP BY "tms_TaskAssignment"."task") "deduped" 
ON "tms_TaskAssignment"."task" = "deduped"."task"
   AND "tms_TaskAssignment"."assignedAt" = "deduped"."lastAssignedAt"
LEFT JOIN "tms_User" ON "tms_TaskAssignment"."assignee" = "tms_User"."id"
WHERE "tms_Task"."source" = 'Jira' AND "tms_Task"."statusCategory" = 'InProgress' AND <<boardName>> AND <<releaseName>> AND <<statusChangedAt>>) "source" GROUP BY "source"."assignee"
ORDER BY "source"."assignee" ASC) "source"

SELECT "tms_Task"."uid" AS "uid", "tms_User"."name" AS "assignee", "tms_Task"."name" AS "name", "tms_Task"."priority" AS "priority", "tms_Task"."statusChangedAt" AS "statusChangedAt", "tms_Task"."typeDetail" AS "typeDetail", "tms_Task"."statusDetail" AS "statusDetail"
FROM "tms_Task"
LEFT JOIN "tms_TaskBoardRelationship" ON "tms_Task"."id" = "tms_TaskBoardRelationship"."task"
LEFT JOIN "tms_TaskBoard" ON "tms_TaskBoard"."id" = "tms_TaskBoardRelationship"."board" 
LEFT JOIN "tms_TaskAssignment" ON "tms_Task"."id" = "tms_TaskAssignment"."task"
LEFT JOIN "tms_TaskReleaseRelationship" ON "tms_Task"."id" = "tms_TaskReleaseRelationship"."task"
LEFT JOIN "tms_Release" ON "tms_Release"."id" = "tms_TaskReleaseRelationship"."release"
INNER JOIN (SELECT "tms_TaskAssignment"."task", max("tms_TaskAssignment"."assignedAt") AS "lastAssignedAt" FROM "tms_TaskAssignment"
GROUP BY "tms_TaskAssignment"."task") "deduped" 
ON "tms_TaskAssignment"."task" = "deduped"."task"
   AND "tms_TaskAssignment"."assignedAt" = "deduped"."lastAssignedAt"
LEFT JOIN "tms_User" ON "tms_TaskAssignment"."assignee" = "tms_User"."id"
WHERE "tms_Task"."source" = 'Jira' AND "tms_Task"."statusCategory" = 'InProgress' AND <<boardName>> AND <<statusChangedAt>> AND <<releaseName>>
ORDER BY "tms_Task"."statusChangedAt" DESC

SELECT count(distinct "source"."assignee") FROM (SELECT "tms_Task"."uid" AS "uid", "tms_User"."name" AS "assignee", "tms_Task"."name" AS "name", "tms_Task"."priority" AS "priority", "tms_Task"."createdAt" AS "createdAt", "tms_Task"."statusChangedAt" AS "statusChangedAt", "tms_Task"."typeDetail" AS "typeDetail", "tms_Task"."statusDetail" AS "statusDetail"
FROM "tms_Task"
LEFT JOIN "tms_TaskBoardRelationship" ON "tms_Task"."id" = "tms_TaskBoardRelationship"."task"
LEFT JOIN "tms_TaskBoard" ON "tms_TaskBoard"."id" = "tms_TaskBoardRelationship"."board" 
LEFT JOIN "tms_TaskAssignment" ON "tms_Task"."id" = "tms_TaskAssignment"."task"
LEFT JOIN "tms_TaskReleaseRelationship" ON "tms_Task"."id" = "tms_TaskReleaseRelationship"."task"
LEFT JOIN "tms_Release" ON "tms_Release"."id" = "tms_TaskReleaseRelationship"."release"
INNER JOIN (SELECT "tms_TaskAssignment"."task", max("tms_TaskAssignment"."assignedAt") AS "lastAssignedAt" FROM "tms_TaskAssignment"
GROUP BY "tms_TaskAssignment"."task") "deduped" 
ON "tms_TaskAssignment"."task" = "deduped"."task"
   AND "tms_TaskAssignment"."assignedAt" = "deduped"."lastAssignedAt"
LEFT JOIN "tms_User" ON "tms_TaskAssignment"."assignee" = "tms_User"."id"
WHERE "tms_Task"."source" = 'Jira' AND "tms_Task"."statusCategory" = 'InProgress' AND <<boardName>> AND <<statusChangedAt>> AND <<releaseName>>
ORDER BY "tms_Task"."statusChangedAt" DESC) "source"
